TITLE: # Eagles Flock to Woodstock Development Support Pr...

# Eagles Flock to Woodstock Development Support Proposal

**Project:** Eagles Flock to Woodstock  
**Location:** 0 Lagoon Rd, Hattiesburg, MS (PPIN: 26700)  
**Client:** Kent Batman - <redacted.email>  
**Presented by:** Michael Hoffman, CEO, North Star Group, Inc.  
**Date:** August 12, 2025

---

## Executive Summary

North Star Group proposes to provide comprehensive pre-engineering support for your $7.6 million Eagles Flock to Woodstock development on Lagoon Road. Our approach reduces total project costs by completing essential groundwork before engaging licensed professionals, while ensuring full compliance with FEMA floodway regulations and local permitting requirements.

**Project Overview:**
- **Property:** PPIN 26700 (2.98 acres), A-1 Zoning, Ward 2, Forrest County
- **Flood Status:** AE-Floodway (Elevation Certificate Required)
- **Proposed Use:** Camp/Lodge Development (Phase 1: Pilot Community)
- **Challenge:** Development in FEMA-designated floodway requiring No-Rise Certification

---

## Our Strategic Approach

North Star Group provides technical preparation and project coordination to streamline your floodway development process. We handle the complex groundwork so licensed professionals can focus on certification and approval.

### What We Do
- **FEMA Model Acquisition & Analysis** - Order and process official hydraulic model data 
- **HEC-RAS Model Development** - Create preliminary no-rise analysis with clear deliverables for PE review
- **Regulatory Research** - Document specific requirements and create compliance checklists
- **Professional Scope Development** - Prepare detailed scopes of work for engineers and surveyors
- **Project Coordination** - Clear communication between all parties

### What You Get
- Preliminary technical analysis ready for Professional Engineer certification
- Detailed scopes of work that reduce professional engineering time
